name: Jumpy Street (Zwataketa)
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys to move, Mouse to navigate menu.

You're a frog. 'Nuff said. Hop around and try to grab as much fruit as you can, but beware of cars, water, and falling behind!

A game I made with a fellow classmate in college. I programmed most systems and gameplay mechanics, and they did the art and sounds.
